com.vectorprint.report.itext

Class EventHelper<RD extends ReportDataHolder>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfPageEventHelper
      • com.vectorprint.report.itext.EventHelper<RD>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfPageEvent, ReportDataAware<RD>, DocumentAware, ImageLoaderAware, LayerManagerAware, StylerFactory

    public class EventHelper<RD extends ReportDataHolder>
extends com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfPageEventHelper
implements StylerFactory, ReportDataAware<RD>
    Responsible for printing headers, footers, debugging and failure information. Note that this handler uses a PdfTemplate with the dimensions of the first page of the document to afterwards write information (pagenumber, failure header) to pages, hence for now positioning may fail when using different page sizes.
    Author:
    Eduard Drenth at VectorPrint.nl

      • onCloseDocument

        public void onCloseDocument(com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfWriter writer,
                   com.itextpdf.text.Document document)
        calls #printTotalPages(com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfTemplate, com.itextpdf.text.Font, float, float) with a font from setup, document.right() and the calculated bottom of the footertable. Clears the layermanager. When applicable calls printFailureHeader(com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfTemplate, float, float)
        Specified by:
